Michaël Hompus is a Software Architect at Info Support. As Software Architect he is part of several teams, realizing new and innovative solutions, preferable using the Microsoft Cloud. Michaël has many years of development experience with .NET, Microsoft Azure, Office 365 and Dynamics 365. His passion is to share knowledge, with colleagues, customers and peers.
